User\_Authentication
====================

This package handles user authentication for the Django project. It includes components for user registration, login and logout.

Submodules
----------

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

.. automodule:: user_auth.urls
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
